films.title: Kings Are Wild
films.description: Kings Are Wild is a comedy web series created by David John Seltzer and David Shea Henne. It is available for free on YouTube.

credits.label: Synopsis
credits.text: Two dudes set their sights high when they decide to start a podcast. But they soon find out that they don't have the discipline or work ethic to follow through.

credits.label: Starring
credits.text: David John Seltzer, David Shea Henne, Chelsea Jordan, Michelle Agresti, Tess Llanos, Kaylie Gipson, Donald Lee Gipson

films.title: No More 54 by Dada Life
films.description: The official music video for Dada Life's No More 54 features D.J. as a dancing disco ball man.
